title: For anyone who could not view the BRUCE samples...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Blackdress_6208.jpg)

Revlon Annual Report 1986

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Bruce_2_5506.jpg)

Close-up of “Bruce”, a .jpg conversion from a hires .pdf saved from a hires scan of a 35mm transparency dupe.
author: nancy sharon collins

comments.content:
The pictures are CMYK. If you turn them to RGB it will work.

Pieter

pieter,

gosh, you are correct. thank you.

HI,

That design looks really nice! Great typesetting too. I just wondered if anyone else saw the typo?

Line 8

’This attitude as permeated all levels...’

should be

’This attitude has permeated all levels...’

Am I wrong?
